works.description:
Harman Kardon Audio is well known for its
 
aesthetic designs and luxury looks meant for the high-end consumers. The  
company is now bringing its musical excellence to your kitchen in  
collaboration with Verburg Audio. The MaestroKitchen 100 system by Harman 

Kardon will enable you to enjoy your music just as you like it with high  
performance audio in the kitchen.
